title: [K-12] Multicultural Online Field Experience: Enhancing Multicultural Understanding Through Mentoring-Based Action Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT utilization skills and general interest in multicultural education
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment modeled after online collaboration experiences between U.S. university students and developing-country teachers, exploring sociocultural differences in technology integration processes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational technology environment and socioeconomic constraints in developing countries through online collaboration.
While performing mentoring, learners can identify three or more multicultural conflict cases arising in ICT-based instructional design and propose solutions.
Based on action research findings, learners can write reports evaluating the impact of technology access gaps on educational outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
